title: The Master-Key to Riches: The World-Famous Philosophy of Personal Achievement Based on the Andrew Carnegie Formula for Money-Making
description: Based on the Andrew Carnegie formula for money-making, THE MASTER-KEY TO RICHES describes in step-by-step detail today's greatest practical philosophy of success....This amazing philosophy, culled from the success experiences of hundreds of the world's most powerful and wealthy men, will show you how to succeed in any walk of life.
author: Napoleon Hill
